participant_1.background:
Others think I'm weird because I'm a health nut but still love sweets.
I'm happy to have a beautiful home and get to share my passion for gaming with others.
I used to wear my brother's hand-me-downs when I was younger.
i hope one day to own a stable of at least 10 race horses.
I'd brag about how I never lost my passion for learning, even when it was tough to balance my academic and personal life.

driving in the country side is a pastime.

i like meat.

content.text: I'm so glad I was able to build a beautiful home for myself. I share my passion for gaming with others.
I love watching cartoons as well. What are some of your favorites?
I used to watch a lot of Tom and Jerry and Scooby Doo when I was a child. I still enjoy them from time to time.
I love Scooby Doo too! What are some of your favorite games to play?
I like to play a variety of games, but I especially enjoy racing games.
I like playing racing games as well. I also enjoy playing strategy games.
I've never really been into strategy games, but I'm always open to trying new things.
You should try playing some strategy games. They can be a lot of fun.
I will! Do you have any recommendations?
I would recommend playing Civilization VI. It's a really fun game.
